Description: ESP USA Eclipse 2015 Sapphire Black MetallicFor sale is my 2015 ESP Eclipse USA Sapphire Black Metallic. This guitar is made in North Hollywood, CA. The guitar is rarely played and is in excellent condition. Brand new price for this guitar is $3,499. Please check out the photos. I replaced the pickups with EMG 81/85. It originally came with a Seymour Duncan pickups so there is no battery door compartment in the back. You have to unscrew the back plate to replace the battery. I also replaced the chrome hardware with black hardware. The stock chrome hardware and the original Seymour Duncan pickups are NOT included.Message me for any questions. The guitar weighs approximately 9 lbs and 2.6 oz on my postal weighing scale. This guitar has a fast neck. Original hard case Included. Plastic cover still on the hard case logo. Please send me a message for any question. Please look at the photos before purchasing. I only ship to the lower 48 states. I don’t ship international. I only accept Paypal. Item will be shipped within 48 hours (except weekend and holidays) of cleared payments. This guitar is also listed locally and in other online websites. I have the right to cancel the sale at anytime in the event this guitar sells first on the other sites. Message me first prior to bidding if you have ZERO feedback. Otherwise your bid will be cancelled. Sorry, I just have too many problems with new buyers with ZERO feedback.
Title: ESP ECLIPSE USA SAPPHIRE BLACK METALLIC
